metadata.synopsis: The guards can be convinced to let you in if you are Gith-looking, produce the box, or persuade them you have a reason to be at the creche.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get spotted by the main checkpoint guards.  Input "oe cre_voss_friendly" and "oe cre_voss_hostile" as debug commands respectively to test the different Voss permutations ("oe cre_voss_skipped" clears both tags).

3.speaker: Gish Far'aag
3.text: Walk well within Crèche Y'llek, ra'stil.

21.speaker: Gish Far'aag
21.text: Sentries, to arms! Istik. State your purpose. Quickly.
21.context: NodeContext: 'istik' pronounced iss-tick - "quickly" said as a threat

83.speaker: Lae'zel
83.text: Stand down, gish. Is it not Vlaakith's command to welcome her faithful?

1.speaker: Gish Far'aag
1.text: I expected no visitors, faithful or otherwise. Why have you come?

95.speaker: Lae'zel
95.text: We seek the zaith'isk. Show me the way.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: I have the weapon Voss was looking for, that your crèche wanted found.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: I'm on your side! Captain Voss sent me to find an item for you.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: I was infected by an illithid, and was told to seek a githyanki crèche.

59.speaker: Gish Far'aag
59.text: A ghaik thrall is something to eradicate, not reason with.

109.speaker: Lae'zel
109.text: The faithful may be purified. This is Vlaakith's protocol!

107.speaker: Gish Far'aag
107.text: Chk. Fine - let the ghustil carry out your fate.

96.speaker: Gish Far'aag
96.text: Report to the infirmary at once. And step carefully. Crèche Y'llek watches you.

86.speaker: Player
86.text: I found the weapon you seek. Want to explain to Voss why you killed me?

62.speaker: Gish Far'aag
62.text: You've talked to one of our queen's silver knights, and hold the lost weapon? Prove it, istik.

111.speaker: Narrator
111.text: *The artefact stirs within your pocket - suddenly within your reach, but reluctant to be known to the githyanki.*

4.speaker: Gish Far'aag
4.text: Tsk'va... It speaks truth. The inquisitor will be most pleased.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player produces the artefact before putting it away again. NodeContext: tsk-VA meaning "Shit"

38.speaker: Gish Far'aag
38.text: Report to the captain. She will take you to the Inquisitor.

87.speaker: Gish Far'aag
87.text: Ra'stil... You bring great honour on Crèche Y'llek this day. The Inquisitor will be pleased.
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player produces the artefact before putting it away again. NodeContext: "rah-STILL" meaning "ally" gith

52.speaker: Player
52.text: I SPEAK AS AN AVATAR OF QUEEN VLAAKITH. YOU WILL LET ME PASS, VIN'IISK.

69.speaker: Gish Far'aag
69.text: ...An avatar? Of the undying regent herself? I beg your mercy, jhe'stil.
69.context: NodeContext: ''zhe-STILL. (/ʒ/ sound on first consonant, like the "s" in "usual".)'' meaning ''superior one''

70.speaker: Gish Far'aag
70.text: Inquisitor W'wargaz will be honoured to meet you. Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith.
70.context: NodeContext: "cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith" meaning "Vlaakith's will above all"

13.speaker: Gish Far'aag
13.text: Silence! I will tear her name from your impure tongue.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: I was told to bring the weapon to the highest authority possible. That doesn't look like you.

9.speaker: Gish Far'aag
9.text: At least the weapon is here. Inquisitor W'wargaz will be pleased.

60.speaker: Gish Far'aag
60.text: If you are lying, it'll be a painful death. The Inquisitor is deeper in the crèche.

24.speaker: Gish Far'aag
24.text: Your insolent species knows nothing of authority, k'chakhi. Let me teach you.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: I will report to your kith'rak as protocol dictates. Do not forget yourself.

104.speaker: Gish Far'aag
104.text: Forgive me, ra'stil. Our nerves are somewhat heightened with the Inquisition's presence.
104.context: NodeContext: "cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith" meaning "Vlaakith's will above all"

114.speaker: Gish Far'aag
114.text: Go, seek Inquisitor W'wargaz within. Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith.

5.speaker: Gish Far'aag
5.text: Do not cite protocol to me, shka'keth.
5.context: NodeContext: ''SHKA keth'' meaning asshole in gith

101.speaker: Player
101.text: I'm no thrall. I came here freely, didn't I?

88.speaker: Gish Far'aag
88.text: You are infected. A source of plague. Nothing more.

45.speaker: Gish Far'aag
45.text: You could turn at any moment. I will protect my kin. Hta'zith!

43.speaker: Player
43.text: I've been infected for a while. Your doctors could study me.

32.speaker: Gish Far'aag
32.text: The ghustil has been taking an... Unprecedented interest in the ghaik tadpoles of late.
32.context: NodeContext: almost disgusted? these guards aren't on board with the rumours they've heard about their doctor

102.speaker: Gish Far'aag
102.text: Fine. Report to the infirmary. Quickly.

77.speaker: Gish Far'aag
77.text: Chk... It wouldn't be the strangest study she's done.

19.speaker: Gish Far'aag
19.text: Report to the infirmary at once. Step carefully, istik, Crèche Y'llek watches you.

108.speaker: Gish Far'aag
108.text: Your corpse would be just as useful, ghaik filth.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Let me pass. Fighting me will end badly for you.

94.speaker: Gish Far'aag
94.text: Arrogant, for such a limited species.

112.speaker: Narrator
112.text: *The sentry considers you for a moment, assessing the risk you pose.*

26.speaker: Gish Far'aag
26.text: Very well. Perhaps Inquisitor W'wargaz could use the aid of an adventurer.

119.speaker: Gish Far'aag
119.text: Seek the Inquisitor within. Step lightly, istik - he's not known for his lenience.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: You githyanki hate illithid. I have proof that they're invading. We need your help.

93.speaker: Gish Far'aag
93.text: We are aware, and it is dire. But of late we've been distracted.

31.speaker: Gish Far'aag
31.text: Perhaps the news you bring will change Inquisitor W'wargaz's mind.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: I'm an unmatched killer. You want me as your ally.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: I hunt monsters. Either that's you, or it's the mind flayers - your choice.

106.speaker: Player
106.text: Try to recall and invoke the ancient githyanki war rites of parley.

65.speaker: Lae'zel
65.text: Faithful gish, Vlaakith gha'g shkath zai.
65.context: NodeContext: VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI. For the honour of Vlaakith.

51.speaker: Gish Far'aag
51.text: Shkath zai. We were not expecting visitors, kin. What brings you here?

98.speaker: Gish Far'aag
98.text: Halt. We were not expecting visitors, kin. What brings you here?

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Kith'rak Voss was searching for a weapon. I have it with me.

76.speaker: Gish Far'aag
76.text: If that is so, you succeed where others have failed.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: Kith'rak Voss instructed me to bring a weapon to our kin. I have found it.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: Ra'stil, listen. I am infected by ghaik, your mandate is to aid me.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Kith'rak Voss entrusted me with finding a weapon. I have done so, you will let me pass.

10.speaker: Gish Far'aag
10.text: Is that so? His efficiency is to be commended then, as is yours.
10.context: NodeContext: Excited, almost forgetting the stuffy gith decorum

80.speaker: Gish Far'aag
80.text: Produce this weapon and you may pass.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: I dare you to try. Otherwise, step aside, shka'keth.

113.speaker: Gish Far'aag
113.text: Chk. The Inquisitor better not hear of this. Report to the infirmary.

42.speaker: Gish Far'aag
42.text: You could turn at any moment. I will not let a ghaik abomination endanger my kin.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: The ceremorphosis is delayed. Your crèche's doctors would find me useful to study.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: Stand aside, or crumble in combat.

121.speaker: Player
121.text: There is a ghaik scourge in these lands. I need this crèche's help.
